description: Replacement of front wall and pedestrian gate with two swinging gates and fence; new vehicular crossover.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 010, 011, 012, 013 and 014.  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s) (A596 04 Rev A). REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing materials and those as described on the plans.  Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies LV 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1, and 1.2 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2015). | All materials to be used in the development shall match those as outlined on the approved plans:  A596 04 Rev A. Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies Local Variation 7.4, 7B and 7C, policies 1.1 (g) and (h), 1.2 (f) and (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (Consolidated 2015).
